quiz.question: ______ prowess
quiz.explanation: 本领,战斗本领。The warrior's battle prowess was legendary among his people.战士的战斗本领在他的人民中是传奇的。

quiz.question: _____ hiss
quiz.explanation: 嘶嘶声,蛇嘶嘶声。The threatening snake hiss warned intruders to stay away.威胁性的蛇嘶嘶声警告入侵者远离。

quiz.question: _________ amiss
quiz.explanation: 有问题,有问题的事。She sensed something amiss when the house was too quiet.当房子太安静时,她感觉到有问题的事。

quiz.question: __________ crisscross
quiz.explanation: 十字交叉,十字交叉图案。The fabric featured a geometric crisscross pattern design.织物具有几何十字交叉图案设计。

quiz.question: engross __ ____
quiz.explanation: 全神贯注,全神贯注于工作。He was so engrossed in work that he forgot to eat.他全神贯注于工作,以至于忘记吃饭。

quiz.question: ____ concuss
quiz.explanation: 震荡,头部震荡。The blow would head concuss causing temporary confusion.打击会使头部震荡造成暂时的混乱。

quiz.question: ____ _ fuss
quiz.explanation: 大惊小怪,大惊小怪。Stop making such a fuss about minor inconveniences.不要对小不便大惊小怪。

quiz.question: ____ callus
quiz.explanation: 老茧,皮肤老茧。Hard work created thick skin calluses on his hands.艰苦的工作在他手上形成了厚厚的皮肤老茧。

quiz.question: ____ nonplus
quiz.explanation: 困惑,使困惑。The mysterious riddle left nonplus everyone completely confused.神秘的谜语使每个人都完全困惑。

quiz.question: _______ bulbous
quiz.explanation: 球根状的,球根状的鼻子。The cartoon character had a comically bulbous nose.卡通人物有一个滑稽的球根状鼻子。

quiz.question: _______ raucous
quiz.explanation: 刺耳的,刺耳的笑声。His raucous laugh could be heard across the room.他刺耳的笑声能在房间另一边听到。

quiz.question: __________ stupendous
quiz.explanation: 惊人的,惊人的景色。The mountain summit offered a stupendous view of valleys below.山顶提供了下面山谷惊人的景色。

quiz.question: _______ hideous
quiz.explanation: 可怕的,可怕的怪物。The nightmare featured a hideous monster chasing victims.噩梦中有一个追逐受害者的可怕怪物。

quiz.question: ________ nauseous
quiz.explanation: 令人作呕的,令人作呕的气味。The nauseous smell from the garbage made everyone sick.垃圾发出的令人作呕气味让每个人都感到恶心。

quiz.question: _______ dubious
quiz.explanation: 可疑的,可疑的声明。The politician made a dubious claim without evidence.政治家在没有证据的情况下做出了可疑的声明。

quiz.question: ___________ efficacious
quiz.explanation: 有效的,有效的补救措施。The traditional efficacious remedy cured many ailments.传统的有效补救措施治愈了许多疾病。

quiz.question: ________ gracious
quiz.explanation: 亲切的,亲切的主人。The gracious host made all guests feel welcome.亲切的主人让所有客人感到受欢迎。

quiz.question: _________ vivacious
quiz.explanation: 活泼的,活泼的女孩。The vivacious girl brought energy to every gathering.活泼的女孩给每次聚会带来能量。

quiz.question: __________ precocious
quiz.explanation: 早熟的,早熟的孩子。The precocious child read advanced books at age five.早熟的孩子五岁时阅读高级书籍。

quiz.question: _________ ferocious
quiz.explanation: 凶猛的,凶猛的野兽。The ferocious beast attacked with terrifying fury.凶猛的野兽以可怕的愤怒攻击。

quiz.question: _______ tedious
quiz.explanation: 乏味的,乏味的任务。The tedious task of data entry bored everyone.乏味的数据输入任务让每个人都感到无聊。

quiz.question: _____________ supercilious
quiz.explanation: 傲慢的,傲慢的眼神。Her supercilious look conveyed disdain for others.她傲慢的眼神传达了对他人的蔑视。

quiz.question: __________ rebellious
quiz.explanation: 叛逆的,叛逆的青少年。The rebellious teenager defied parental authority constantly.叛逆的青少年不断反抗父母的权威。

quiz.question: _________ ingenious
quiz.explanation: 巧妙的,巧妙的想法。The inventor's ingenious idea solved a longstanding problem.发明家巧妙的想法解决了一个长期问题。

quiz.question: ______________ sanctimonious
quiz.explanation: 伪善的,伪善的语气。His sanctimonious tone annoyed those who knew better.他伪善的语气惹恼了那些更了解的人。

quiz.question: _______ copious
quiz.explanation: 大量的,大量的笔记。The diligent student took copious notes during lectures.勤奋的学生在讲座期间做了大量的笔记。

quiz.question: _______ devious
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的,狡猾的计划。The villain hatched a devious plan to steal secrets.恶棍策划了一个狡猾的计划窃取秘密。

quiz.question: _________ oblivious
quiz.explanation: 健忘的,健忘的人。The oblivious man walked past without noticing anything unusual.健忘的人走过而没有注意到任何不寻常的事情。

quiz.question: __________ marvellous
quiz.explanation: 奇妙的,奇妙的景色。The sunset provided a marvellous view of colors.日落提供了色彩奇妙的景色。

quiz.question: _________ frivolous
quiz.explanation: 轻浮的,轻浮的诉讼。The judge dismissed the frivolous lawsuit immediately.法官立即驳回了轻浮的诉讼。

quiz.question: _________ tremulous
quiz.explanation: 颤抖的,颤抖的声音。Her tremulous voice betrayed her nervousness to everyone.她颤抖的声音向每个人暴露了她的紧张。

quiz.question: ________ ravenous
quiz.explanation: 贪婪的,贪婪的饥饿。After fasting, they felt ravenous hunger beyond control.禁食后,他们感到无法控制的贪婪饥饿。

quiz.question: _______ heinous
quiz.explanation: 令人发指的,令人发指的罪行。The heinous crime shocked the entire nation deeply.令人发指的罪行深深震惊了整个国家。

quiz.question: _______ ominous
quiz.explanation: 不祥的,不祥的征兆。Dark clouds gave an ominous sign of approaching storm.乌云给出了即将来临风暴的不祥征兆。

quiz.question: ________ luminous
quiz.explanation: 发光的,发光的星星。Luminous stars shone brightly in the clear night sky.发光的星星在晴朗的夜空中明亮地闪耀。

quiz.question: _________ glutinous
quiz.explanation: 黏性的,黏性的米饭。Asian cuisine often features sticky glutinous rice dishes.亚洲美食经常以黏性的米饭菜肴为特色。

quiz.question: ________ mutinous
quiz.explanation: 反叛的,反叛的水手。The mutinous sailors planned to overthrow the captain.反叛的水手计划推翻船长。

quiz.question: __________ monotonous
quiz.explanation: 单调的,单调的工作。The monotonous job of assembly line work drained energy.单调的装配线工作耗尽了能量。

quiz.question: _________ cavernous
quiz.explanation: 洞穴般的,洞穴般的大厅。The cavernous hall echoed with every footstep sound.洞穴般的大厅回荡着每一个脚步声。

quiz.question: _________ ludicrous
quiz.explanation: 荒谬的,荒谬的想法。The ludicrous idea was rejected by everyone immediately.荒谬的想法立即被每个人拒绝。

quiz.question: ________ wondrous
quiz.explanation: 奇妙的,奇妙的景象。The aurora borealis created a wondrous sight overhead.北极光在头顶创造了奇妙的景象。

quiz.question: _________ murderous
quiz.explanation: 凶残的,凶残的愤怒。The killer attacked in a murderous rage without mercy.杀手在凶残的愤怒中无情地攻击。

quiz.question: __________ vociferous
quiz.explanation: 喧嚣的,喧嚣的抗议。The vociferous protest could be heard blocks away.喧嚣的抗议在几个街区外都能听到。

quiz.question: ___________ treacherous
quiz.explanation: 危险的,危险的水域。Sailors avoided the treacherous waters near the rocks.水手避开岩石附近的危险水域。

quiz.question: _______ onerous
quiz.explanation: 繁重的,繁重的职责。The onerous duty of leadership weighed heavily on him.繁重的领导职责沉重地压在他身上。

quiz.question: __________ boisterous
quiz.explanation: 喧闹的,喧闹的人群。The boisterous crowd celebrated loudly after the victory.喧闹的人群在胜利后大声庆祝。

quiz.question: ________ desirous
quiz.explanation: 渴望的,渴望的眼神。His desirous look revealed his longing for success.他渴望的眼神透露出他对成功的渴望。

quiz.question: __________ traitorous
quiz.explanation: 叛国的,叛国的行为。The spy's traitorous act betrayed his country completely.间谍的叛国行为完全背叛了他的国家。

quiz.question: _________ monstrous
quiz.explanation: 可怕的,可怕的谎言。The politician told a monstrous lie to cover up scandal.政治家说了一个可怕的谎言来掩盖丑闻。

quiz.question: _________ rapturous
quiz.explanation: 狂喜的,狂喜的掌声。The performance received rapturous applause from the audience.演出获得了观众狂喜的掌声。

quiz.question: ________ covetous
quiz.explanation: 贪婪的,贪婪的眼睛。His covetous eyes gazed at the valuable treasure hungrily.他贪婪的眼睛饥渴地凝视着贵重的宝藏。

quiz.question: ________ unctuous
quiz.explanation: 油腔滑调的,油腔滑调的语气。The salesman's unctuous tone seemed insincere and false.推销员油腔滑调的语气似乎不真诚和虚假。

quiz.question: __________ tumultuous
quiz.explanation: 喧闹的,喧闹的掌声。The speaker received tumultuous applause after the speech.演讲者在演讲后获得了喧闹的掌声。

quiz.question: ____________ contemptuous
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑的,轻蔑的冷笑。Her contemptuous sneer showed complete disdain for others.她轻蔑的冷笑显示出对他人的完全蔑视。

quiz.question: _________ sumptuous
quiz.explanation: 奢华的,奢华的盛宴。The king hosted a sumptuous feast for honored guests.国王为贵宾举办了奢华的盛宴。

quiz.question: ________ grievous
quiz.explanation: 严重的,严重的伤害。The accident caused grievous injury requiring immediate surgery.事故造成了需要立即手术的严重伤害。

quiz.question: ___ pus
quiz.explanation: 脓,充满脓。The infected wound was filled with yellow pus discharge.受感染的伤口充满了黄色脓液排出物。

quiz.question: ____ detritus
quiz.explanation: 碎屑,岩石碎屑。Rock detritus covered the ground after the landslide.山体滑坡后,岩石碎屑覆盖了地面。

quiz.question: ____ sideways
quiz.explanation: 侧面,侧面看。She would look sideways suspiciously at the stranger.她会怀疑地侧面看陌生人。

quiz.question: _____ dingbat
quiz.explanation: 傻瓜,愚蠢的傻瓜。That silly dingbat forgot the keys again today.那个愚蠢的傻瓜今天又忘记了钥匙。

quiz.question: ____ polecat
quiz.explanation: 臭鼬,野生臭鼬。The wild polecat emitted a terrible defensive odor.野生臭鼬散发出可怕的防御气味。

quiz.question: _____ bleat
quiz.explanation: 咩咩叫,羊咩咩叫。The sheep would bleat loudly when separated from flock.羊在与羊群分离时会大声咩咩叫。

quiz.question: mistreat _____
quiz.explanation: 虐待,严重虐待。It's cruel to mistreat badly animals in any way.以任何方式严重虐待动物是残忍的。

quiz.question: unseat _____
quiz.explanation: 使落马,使骑手落马。The wild horse tried to unseat rider with violent bucking.野马试图用猛烈的跳跃使骑手落马。

quiz.question: _____ nougat
quiz.explanation: 牛轧糖,有嚼劲的牛轧糖。The candy bar contained sweet chewy nougat filling.糖果棒含有甜的有嚼劲的牛轧糖馅。

quiz.question: ____ splat
quiz.explanation: 啪嗒声,响亮的啪嗒声。The tomato hit with a loud splat against the wall.西红柿打在墙上发出响亮的啪嗒声。

quiz.question: ____ doormat
quiz.explanation: 门垫,擦门垫。Please wipe doormat before entering the clean house.请在进入干净的房子前擦门垫。

quiz.question: _______ rowboat
quiz.explanation: 划艇,划艇旅行。They enjoyed a peaceful rowboat ride on the lake.他们在湖上享受了一次平静的划艇旅行。

quiz.question: ________ tailcoat
quiz.explanation: 燕尾服,燕尾服套装。The conductor wore a formal tailcoat suit to perform.指挥穿着正式的燕尾服套装演出。

quiz.question: ________ turncoat
quiz.explanation: 叛徒,叛徒变节者。The turncoat traitor switched sides during the war.叛徒变节者在战争期间转换阵营。

quiz.question: ____ overcoat
quiz.explanation: 大衣,羊毛大衣。He wore a heavy wool overcoat against the cold.他穿着厚重的羊毛大衣御寒。

quiz.question: _________ waistcoat
quiz.explanation: 背心,背心马甲。The gentleman wore a waistcoat vest under his jacket.绅士在夹克下穿着背心马甲。

quiz.question: gloat ____
quiz.explanation: 幸灾乐祸,幸灾乐祸。Don't gloat over the misfortunes of others cruelly.不要残忍地对他人的不幸幸灾乐祸。

quiz.question: _____ stoat
quiz.explanation: 白鼬,白鼬皮毛。In winter, the stoat fur turns completely white.在冬天,白鼬皮毛完全变白。

quiz.question: _______ brat
quiz.explanation: 顽童,被宠坏的顽童。The spoiled brat demanded toys and threw tantrums constantly.被宠坏的顽童不断要求玩具并发脾气。

quiz.question: _____ prat
quiz.explanation: 傻瓜,愚蠢的傻瓜。That silly prat made foolish mistakes all day long.那个愚蠢的傻瓜整天犯愚蠢的错误。

quiz.question: _____ kumquat
quiz.explanation: 金橘,多汁的金橘。The small juicy kumquat has a sweet edible skin.小的多汁金橘有甜的可食用皮。

quiz.question: squat ____
quiz.explanation: 蹲下,蹲下。The children would squat down to examine the insects.孩子们会蹲下来检查昆虫。

quiz.question: swat ___
quiz.explanation: 拍打,拍打苍蝇。He tried to swat fly buzzing around the kitchen.他试图拍打在厨房里嗡嗡作响的苍蝇。

quiz.question: _______ artefact
quiz.explanation: 文物,古代文物。Archaeologists discovered an ancient artefact from Roman times.考古学家发现了罗马时代的古代文物。

quiz.question: reenact _____
quiz.explanation: 重演,重演场景。Historians would reenact scene from the famous battle.历史学家会重演著名战役的场景。

quiz.question: ______ abject
quiz.explanation: 悲惨的,悲惨的贫困。The refugees lived in abject poverty without basic necessities.难民生活在没有基本必需品的悲惨贫困中。

quiz.question: ______ deject
quiz.explanation: 使沮丧,使精神沮丧。The constant failures would deject spirits of the team.不断的失败会使团队的精神沮丧。

quiz.question: interject _______
quiz.explanation: 插话,插话评论。She would occasionally interject comment during the discussion.她会在讨论期间偶尔插话评论。

quiz.question: deflect ______
quiz.explanation: 偏转,偏转攻击。The shield would deflect attack from the warrior.盾牌会偏转对战士的攻击。

quiz.question: ____ disrespect
quiz.explanation: 不尊重,表现不尊重。It's rude to show disrespect toward elders or teachers.对长辈或老师表现不尊重是粗鲁的。

quiz.question: _____ intersect
quiz.explanation: 相交,道路相交。Two major roads intersect at the busy downtown corner.两条主要道路在繁忙的市中心角落相交。

quiz.question: contradict _________
quiz.explanation: 矛盾,矛盾声明。The evidence would contradict statement made by witnesses.证据会与证人的声明矛盾。

quiz.question: _____ derelict
quiz.explanation: 废弃的,城市废弃的。The urban derelict building was scheduled for demolition.城市废弃的建筑被安排拆除。

quiz.question: inflict ____
quiz.explanation: 施加,施加痛苦。The torturer would inflict pain on helpless prisoners cruelly.拷问者会残忍地对无助的囚犯施加痛苦。

quiz.question: ___ constrict
quiz.explanation: 收缩,蟒蛇收缩。The boa would constrict tightly around its captured prey.蟒蛇会紧紧地收缩包围被捕获的猎物。

quiz.question: __________ indistinct
quiz.explanation: 模糊的,模糊的形状。An indistinct shape moved through the foggy darkness.一个模糊的形状在雾蒙蒙的黑暗中移动。

quiz.question: __ extinct
quiz.explanation: 灭绝,灭绝。Many species will go extinct without conservation efforts.没有保护努力,许多物种会灭绝。

quiz.question: concoct ____
quiz.explanation: 编造,编造计划。The criminals would concoct plan to rob the bank.罪犯会编造计划抢劫银行。

quiz.question: _____ viaduct
quiz.explanation: 高架桥,石高架桥。The ancient stone viaduct carried trains across the valley.古老的石高架桥载着火车穿越山谷。

quiz.question: induct ______
quiz.explanation: 正式接纳,正式接纳成员。The organization would induct member in a special ceremony.组织会在特别仪式上正式接纳成员。

quiz.question: obstruct _______
quiz.explanation: 妨碍,妨碍司法。Lying to police officers can obstruct justice investigations.向警察撒谎会妨碍司法调查。

quiz.question: _____ sherbet
quiz.explanation: 冰糕,水果冰糕。The refreshing fruit sherbet cooled everyone on hot days.清爽的水果冰糕在炎热的日子里让每个人都凉爽。

quiz.question: ______ dulcet
quiz.explanation: 悦耳的,悦耳的音调。The singer's dulcet tones captivated the entire audience.歌手悦耳的音调迷住了整个观众。

quiz.question: ____ beet
quiz.explanation: 甜菜,甜菜根。The salad included sliced beet root with goat cheese.沙拉包括切片的甜菜根配羊奶酪。
